document_data.name: Quwen
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Quwen''' was the ruler of [[Ormath]] in the [[Shining Plains]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Quwen often led the city's patrols outside the walls of the city in order to clear the road of bandits. In 1370 DR, he was concerned by reports of [[lizardfolk]] activities in the [[Wetwoods|Wetwood]]; none of the squads he had sent were heard from again.
document_data.Personality: Quwen was a true warrior at heart.
